Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: The people are discussing the Budget 2023. One person is excited to chat about it on The Today Show with Karl Stefanovic and Sarah Abo. Another person is going live on Sky News Australia with Tom Connell. A few people assert that the current government is working hard to clean up the budgetary mess of the previous Liberal government. One person expresses congratulations to colleagues and friends for delivering the second Budget and the comfortable life it promises. Further people are looking forward to cost-of-living relief investment in Australia's economy and strengthening defense partnerships in the Indo-Pacific.
